name: tumblr No Bullshit Edition - (new) xKit Expansion
description: If you install new xKit and some modules, some problems may occur with NBE. This theme will tackle these problems.
additional_info:
NBE can be found here: https://userstyles.org/styles/129060/tumblr-no-bull-edition

New xKit is great and I (currently) have no qualms with it. This is just a compatibility theme for color or size or positioning glitches caused by a failure to address the new xKit.
